Package org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference

Interface Summary
Function Interface for SF functions to implement
ReferenceResolver Defines reference resolving.
ReferenceResolverHelper This makes a reference resolver interface available for remotable objects.
RemoteReferenceResolver This makes a reference resolver interface available for remotable objects.
RemoteReferenceResolverHelper This makes a reference resolver interface available for remotable objects.
 

Class Summary
ApplyReference The subclass of Reference that is a function application.
AssertReference The subclass of Reference that is a function application.
AttribReferencePart Implements the attrib reference part.
ConstantReferencePart Implements the constant reference part.
EnvPropertyReferencePart Implements the property reference part.
HereReferencePart Implements the most basic of reference parts.
HostReferencePart Implements the host reference part.
IEnvPropertyReferencePart Implements the ienvproperty reference part.
IPropertyReferencePart Implements the iproperty reference part.
ParentReferencePart Implements the parent reference part.
ProcessReferencePart Implements the process reference part.
PropertyReferencePart Implements the property reference part.
Reference A reference is a list of ReferencePart objects.
ReferencePart Implements the commn reference part.
ReferenceResolverHelperImpl  
RemoteReferenceResolverHelperImpl  
RootReferencePart Implements the root reference part.
ThisReferencePart Implements the most basic of reference parts.
